ygData.subject: Re: Re: AC Dilemma [and other misc stuff]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Chris Musson  To:  Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 10:23 AM Subject: [eqbards] Re: AC
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Musson <oblivious_the_mighty_confused@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 10:23 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: AC Dilemma [and other misc stuff]


> From: Chris Musson <oblivious_the_mighty_confused@...>
>becuase Elf Hide Gloves are a band-aid between Snakeskin and Lambent, IMSO)


What are you, nutz??? : ) I am having a hard time deciding between the Elf
Hide I already had for a long time and the Lambent. The 5 Agil is hard to
give up for the extra AC. I'm going with the Lambent for now, especially
after replacing the 5 Agil with the Greaves, but I'm hanging onto the Elf
Hide in case I change my mind. Elf Hide is TONS better than the Snakeskin,
IMHO, but I do agree, if you want Lambent, why spend money on Elf Hide in
the middle. But, if you have Elf Hide available, I'd reconsider getting
them. : )

Darkfox Reven'tsol of Xegony
